kw.name: Connect To Database
kw.doc: Loads the DB API 2.0 module given `dbapiModuleName` then uses it to connect to the database using `dbName`, `dbUsername`, and `dbPassword`.
kw.msg: Connecting using : pymysql.connect(db=dbfree_db, user=dbfree_db, passwd=12345678, host=db4free.net, port=3306, charset=None)

kw.name: Table Must Exist
kw.doc: Check if the table given exists in the database. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.
kw.msg: Executing : Row Count | SELECT * FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name='Products'

kw.name: Row Count
kw.doc: Uses the input `selectStatement` to query the database and returns the number of rows from the query. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.
kw.msg: Executing : Row Count | Select * from Products

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Row Count Is Equal To X
kw.doc: Check if the number of rows returned from `selectStatement` is equal to the value submitted. If not, then this will throw an AssertionError. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.
kw.msg: Executing : Row Count Is Equal To X | Select * from Products | 50
Executing : Row Count | Select * from Products
